extendedInfo.description: Buycott helps you organize your everyday consumer spending to support causes you care about.Featured as ABC News & Salon.com app of the week.  As seen on NBC, FOX, CNBC, MSNBC, and covered by Forbes and Huffington Post.â HOW IT WORKS ââJoin a campaign to help a cause you care about and commit to actively supporting the companies on your side of the issue, while avoiding those that oppose your position.âScan product barcodes and Buycott will find out what company owns that product (and who owns that company, ad infinitum).âUsing this information, Buycott will determine whether you have joined a campaign that includes the product's owners.â FEATURES ââ Lookup the ownership structure of any product and trace it all the way back to its parent company with our interactive family tree diagram.â Offers a variety of contact data for companies and brands, so you can easily inform them of your decision to support or avoid their products.â Barcode scanner scans all major retail barcodes (UPC-A, UPC-E, EAN8, EAN13, etc).â Create your own campaign from buycott.com

reviews.title: Sounds good on paper
reviews.comment: ....but then the bar code reader never locks on and i just end up standing in the store looking silly.  All it needs is to work....and i\'d use it before every purchase i made!!!!
reviews.author: justin bickham

reviews.title: Great but...
reviews.comment: It\'s a great app but needs a search option so I can look up specific brands. I work in restaurants and a lot of them use the same brands.
reviews.author: Eric Rothenbuhler

reviews.title: Search improvements needed
reviews.comment: Helpful to search by something other than barcode. Also ability to save those products searched
reviews.author: Sarah Swift

reviews.comment: I truly wish this app would work. I\'d be using it every time I shop. But the reader never locks onto the barcode. Even after uninstalling and reinstalling. I replaced my old phone just to have this app, too.
reviews.author: Monica Dewart

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: How can you not like this app? It dies the hard work of informing yourself for you.
reviews.author: Mauro B

reviews.title: Wonderful start. When is \"Search\" going to be added?
reviews.comment: Search. That\'s it. Search. There is no way to search for campaigns from the app. This is needed, otherwise I have to wait until I get back to a desktop PC to join a new campaign (and the website currently isn\'t allowing logins either...) Also, as others have mentioned, being able to skip the scanning altogether and search for items by name would be useful. We can\'t always see barcodes, this would help workaround remaining bugs, and it would also help with devices that have no away camera for which the app is currently disabled.
reviews.author: Greg Conquest

reviews.title: Still privacy risk
reviews.comment: First it \"accidentally\" harvested your contacts and now that\'s been replaced with being forced to either create an account or hand over your Facebook info. And not even a search function?
reviews.author: Matt Bruce

reviews.title: Crashes constantly Note II
reviews.comment: I really love the idea of this app but it just doesn\'t function 75% of the time for me. Crashing repeatedly after opening.
reviews.author: Michael C

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: This app is my new best friend I think
reviews.author: Soleil Oxendine

reviews.title: Excellent app
reviews.comment: Power to the consumer boycott monsanto and other corrupt corporations that vote against your rights. Boycott Nasty GMO products.
reviews.author: Jason Cosgrove

reviews.title: Works well
reviews.comment: I constantly use Buycott and am pleased with the results. It helps steer me away from products that do not support my values.
reviews.author: Bob Groff

reviews.title: Buggy but has great potential
reviews.comment: I do like this app, quite useful while shopping albeit glitchy. It tends to not like scrolling very well after a product has scanned, also the family tree appears to be zoomed in way too much and glitches while panning . So 3 stars until it improves.
reviews.author: Nic MG

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: Nice app, but UI is very ugly, needs a remake. Also add google+ sign in as well as Facebook. Other than that nice app and a great idea with big potential.
reviews.author: Dan Morris

reviews.title: Oust these greedy monsatos!
reviews.comment: I was surprised to see some products that I\'ve enjoyed to be boycotted.  Monsato should not play God with foods!    Based on help from Boycott I\'ve changed my brands.  Some were less expensive and better nutritionwise.
reviews.author: Michael Bouyea

reviews.title: Still some bugs, but handy.
reviews.comment: It\'d be nice if there was an exit button to prevent the errors when left running and if the scanner could be accessed before connecting to the site, but otherwise very handy.
reviews.author: Adam Bois

reviews.title: Awesome, one suggestion
reviews.comment: Great idea, would be nice to be able to include campaign conflict info when submitting a new product. For example, I added a wine from a winery that uses sustainable agriculture practices, it would have been nice to be able to include that.
reviews.author: Jeff Kalmar

reviews.title: awesome
reviews.comment: really great app, so handy and very informative! I use this app almost everyday and all the time at the store. seriously a great idea. it takes the barcode quick and sometimes blurry so it gets the SKU wrong. just make sure to line up the barcode before hitting the scan button
reviews.author: Chris Olson

reviews.title: Superb App
reviews.comment: A very excellent app if you\'re looking for a means to find out if products you\'re buying are putting money into causes you oppose.  I officially tried it out for the first time today, and much to my dismay, found out that Honest Tea is a subsidiary of Coca-Cola, which I would have never known before using this app.  So now I know I have to be more cautious than before with products I buy.    I haven\'t had an issue at all with the scanning of product codes, and the first time I tried it out, I actually Googled a Coca-Cola bar code on my wife\'s phone, and it even scanned that one accurately.    So far I haven\'t run into any bugs or conflicting reports with what I\'ve scanned.  The only thing I wish this app had would be a search feature, and that\'s the only reason I\'m giving it four stars.  Once they implement that feature, I\'ll give it five stars.
reviews.author: Robert Brown IV

reviews.comment: Love app
reviews.author: Katie Cooper

reviews.comment: Great app! but always have to open in it like 3 times before it actually works..
reviews.author: Kara Smith
